瞞.definition: to conceal from; to keep (sb) in the dark

瞞上欺下.definition: to deceive one's superiors and bully one's subordinates (idiom)

瞞報.definition: to conceal or deceive in a report; to falsify by over- or underreporting

瞞天過海.definition: to cross the sea by a trick (idiom); to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
